title: NIT Jamshedpur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Intern Post
description: National Institute of Technology Jamshedpur (NIT Jamshedpur) has issued the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Intern Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech in Electronics and Communication Engineering, M.Sc., Ph.D, and MCA can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Jamshedpur Recruitment 2025 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. If y...
